title: Mariko Bronson
text:
Welcome!
My name is Mariko, and I’ll be graduating UCSB with a B.S. in Environmental Studies. This is my personal website where I’ll be sharing some of my interests! Above, you can access my Github or my contact information.

title: About Me
text:
I grew up in Tokyo, Japan, and moved to California when I was 6 years old. I always planned on becoming a veterinarian, but in high school I took AP Environmental Science which immediately changed my trajectory. I’ll be spending this upcoming fall in Australia doing marine biology and ecology fieldwork, and am especially excited to see their unique stick insects and the Great Barrier Reef. Aside from ecology, my core interests include clean energy, sustainable innovations, urban planning, and soil science.
Outside of school, my interests include cooking, bugs, Pokemon, and taking pictures. To see more about my photography, check out the photography tab!

title: About Me
text:
Cooking
I enjoy making traditional Japanese food and attempting to create my own recipes even though sometimes it means I end up with a pretty weird dinner. Here are some of my favorite meals I’ve made!

title: About Me
text:

title: Critters of Australia
text: Once I’m back from Australia, I’ll upload my favorite plants, bugs, and animals! Stay tuned :)

title: About Me
text:
Pokémon
I grew up on Pokémon- watching the show, playing the games, and collecting the cards. Now, I get my Poké fix from Pokémon Go, and taking the opportunity to show you some of my best shiny finds.



Suicune! One of my favorites since childhood





Shadow Mewtwo is one of the strongest attackers in Pokémon Go! Plus a photobomber





I had to include Joltik- my favorite bug Pokémon!
